Posts.Content: I turned 40 this year!, life is supposed to begin but today I was diagnosed with breast cancer, it's now 4am and I can't sleep and I can't stop crying, I've some t the last hour reading the material given to me at the hospital but I just feel a bit overloaded.  They have said I can still go on my holiday next week and start treatment when u get back which I'm taking as a good sign.......surely if it was bad they would want to do something straight away???
Posts.Title: Diagnised today.......feel a bit lost!

Posts.Content: They just took blood today, told me to go and enjoy my holiday and phone the day after I get back when they will have more of an idea so I really don't know yet, there was a while load of treat me t words flying around earlier but I didn't take much in!  Surgery chemo and radiotherapy were all me tioned as well as something new that I can't remember the name of x
Posts.Title: Diagnised today.......feel a bit lost!

Posts.Content: Thank you!, I dont have any friends or family who have been thru this, your message was lovely and just what I needed to hear right now xxx
Posts.Title: Diagnised today.......feel a bit lost!
